TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

> 20 minutes ago, VoidSquid said:
> 
> 
> I'm curious, a question please, if I may: How do you select the "Threads of the month"?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Can ordinary users like me make suggestions? If so: where, how? Or what are your criteria?
> 

You can suggest threads by using the Report Post button, and letting us know that you'd like to nominate for TOTM.

[@VoidSquid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/196199-voidsquid/) We select them from things we find ourselves or from nominations from other users. Everyone is welcome to nominate a thread for Thread of the Month. If you see some great content, please feel free to report the <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr> with a comment that you would like to nominate it for thread of the month ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
